first,say something about my project:=

e=
xtends MirrorWriterProcessor only writes things I'm interested in.
2.then e=
verything goes well in WUI,I can download what I want!But,every
time I want=

trouble.Because these=
 jobs only different in seeds,other configure are
Exactly the same..so
3.I =

start a=
 job,the main code like:

l";

dler =3D new XMLSettingsHandler(new File(

dler.initialize();

er.initialize(handler);

CrawlStatusListener(listener);

everything goes well,now I only need input new URLs  or just chang=
e the
seed.txt,the job can start right now!

re
